name: 8PM
description:
8PM is a point and click game that is set in Lima, Peru during the Covid-19 quarantine. The objective of the game is to convince the rest of neighbours in the building to join you during the ¨ClapForOurCarers¨ initiative, to thank all the brave people who are still working non-stop to keep us safe.

Team:
Game Design: Alvaro Pita @alpiwu
Production and Art: Danielle Villar @nivinookie
Programming: Francisco Mora @hey_pancho
Music & Sound Effects: Fabio Silva y Diego Salcedo

Special Thanks to everyone remotely involved in the recording of the Clap For Our Carers initiative during the jam.
